title: 89/405/EEC: Commission Decision of 14 June 1989 concerning the importation by Member States of fresh meat from Zimbabwe
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 14 June 1989
concerning the importation by Member States of fresh meat from Zimbabwe
(89/405/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Member States may not authorize the importation of fresh meat from Zimbabwe.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 June 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
